The dragon lowered towards his groin before he opened his claws and let her drop to the ground, "How odd, I think I heard something." As she dropped onto the ground his clawed foot shifted and crashed onto her, pressing her against the cold stone floor, the unwashed claws squeezing against her pleasingly and causing him to let out a soft chuckle, "Well, whatever it was, it feels quite pleasant." He tightened his hold of her and alternated pressing her into the ground and pressing his claws against her idly. "Go back to work you two, I'll look for whatever this fly was." The three let out chuckles as the door thudded shut, leaving her with the claw pressing down on her.

Just when it looked like she was going to be shoved against his draconic sheath he suddenly let her go. She fell to the ground, landing with a wet splat thanks to her soaked coat. She took a breath, and then saw the massive, filthy foot hovering above her. Her eyes widened. "No! Please!" she screamed before the claw slammed down with a moist squish, the mare being crushed under the heavy and poorly cleaned foot. Her snout ended up pinned between two rancid toes, their scaly, stinking surface grinding against her as she gagged at the stench. Meekly she tried to wriggle, when he just stomped again, pressing her into the ground, squeezing her against the floor. She cried weakly as the other two dragons walked away, leaving her for the massive boss to deal with, the door slamming shut like the entrance to a cell.

The dragon continued to work at his desk idly, his claws squeezing into her slightly. After a short while he began to smear her across the ground between his claws, spreading them open slightly, the thick claws prodding at her, smearing her with the filth of the cave, "I often forget how nice it is to have my feet cleaned I don't think a certain fly would mind giving me a little help with that? It may escape a squashing in that case" he chuckled, speaking almost in general to the empty room.

The thestral mare tried to push away his claw, to wriggle out but he was too heavy, too strong. She could do nothing but be squeezed and squished, treated like a toy by those sweaty and filthy claws. When one finally lifted she rolled out, only for the other to take over, stomping her down, covering her in sweat, musk and dirt... then he spoke. She whimpered at his statements, how he insisted she was nothing but an annoying little fly... still she didn't want to be squashed. Shakily she opened her mouth, her tongue sliding out to run across his toes, slide over his soles and making the guards mare gag at the filthy taste.

The dragon sighed happily as he felt her licks, allowing his claws to spread open and giving her access to the sensitive areas between his toes. A cheesy scent spread into the air as the built up filth between his toes. He allowed her some room to breathe while still keeping her tight in his grip. An idle hum droned in the cave as he shuffled somethings on his desk, going about his work as usual.

Moonbounce was nothing to the dragon indeed. She heard him shuffling papers, the scribbling of pen, he was hard at work... and she was just a toy. His toes spread and the most noxious and foul of the cheesy, stinking congealed substance of his toe jam beckoned. She closed her eyes tight, trying to pretend she was eating a delicious treat as she slurped it out, smearing her tongue and face with it in the process as she lowered herself from royal guard to toe sucker.

The dragon’s toes flexed as she cleaned them with her tongue, allowing her more room. "Hmm, sometimes I wonder why I don't do this more often." He rose up slightly, his heel pressing against her and rubbing her across the ground. His body shifted slightly and he rubbed against himself, the scales gnashing loudly.

Moonbounce sucked on those horrid digits, polishing a toe at a time and all the gunk between. Just as she cleaned the last on one foot she felt him flex back. The heel of his foul foot crushed back, pounding her into the ground even more as he pressed her down, flattening her out with the force of his push, his toes sticking to her face as she seemed in danger of wrapping around the foot like some sort of trainer sock.

The dragon pressed his foot against the ground idly, enjoying her attention, but losing himself in concentration. He moved his leg around slightly as he leaned forwards, causing her to be smeared across his claws and foot. He let out an unhappy grunt and remained in the same position for some time, squeezing her against the floor as he moved from side to side slowly, and loud scribbling was audible inside.

The mare was losing her form, her body becoming so liquid that when he ground her next her armour fell off, rolling away, leaving the almost puddle of grey mare to be dragged back and forth, smeared over toes and slathered over sole, the thestral in danger of becoming nothing more than claw and foot gunk from all of the dragons crushing.

The pressure didn't soften as he continued to do whatever he was doing above her, some ruffling papers and clatter sounding around her as he moved things about. His foot pressed against her until she was squeezed into the ground, his toes pressing against her as he seemed to have forgotten that she was there.

Moonbounce couldn't even twitch, the mare still aware, but her body reduced to nothing but squishy mulch. Every squeeze and press pulled her sticky, crushed form across his foot, squeezed her up and into his toes, the mare replacing the sweat she had sucked off as just like a fly the dragon didn't even realise she had been permanently squashed.

The dragon continued with his paperwork, idly shifting about in his chair once in a while and scratching against his gut. He could vaguely remember some dragons having entered his office before he became so enraptured and stretched as he pushed some things aside. He commented about his throne before getting up and loudly thumping towards a door at the side of his office, prodding through and walking along a long hallway that eventually opened up into a large open cave with about a dozen cave paths.

All the while the poor pony that had been reduced to nothing but his toe gunk was squeezed tightly into the ground and collected more filth and gunk as he thumped through the cave floor, the hard surface crashing against her with each step.

He continued into one of them with barely a moment of thought, his feet smashing into the ground loudly and smooshing against the dirty, wet surface of the cave floor until it opened up into an opening under a cliff hidden by forest canopy. "What a day, I have the distinct feeling I'm forgetting something." He said with a stretch, his legs pressing against the grass beneath him, the soft, wet blades tickling against the thestral smear beneath him. He walked along the forest floor small insects and mud smearing across her body, wading through a small bog before reaching yet another cave covered by a large door.

Entering his home he wandered onto a large heap of gems and gold, allowing his rump to flop onto it as he leaned against it and yawned loudly before falling asleep, his toes pressed against his riches.

As those toes wriggled against the treasure, there was barely any sign of Moonbounce any longer. In foot prints along the whole path traces of a grey stinking fluid that might taste like apples was flecked the whole way, pressed into forest ground, smothered into mud, splattered over the hallways. The only bits that still clung to his foot were what lodged deep within his toes... Moonbounce replacing his toe jam for some future unfortunate to suckle out. For this royal guard, that was...

She smiled eagerly as one of the dragon waiters walked up to her and asked for her order, "I'll have the dragon hibernation all you can eat menu please." The dragon nodded once, jotting it down before heading off. She held her hooves together, her eyes glimmering and her mouth began to water as after a short while the waiter returned carrying a platter as large as a pony and placed it down in front of her. As the dragon lifted up the lid she couldn't help but take a deep sniff and bask in the heavenly scents of prepared meats and confections, sided with some healthy leaves. The dragon bowed and told her to beckon if she wanted more and with that left.

Moonbounce stared at the spread before her, a large amount of chopped meats, steamed and cooked, and the smells surrounding her. With an almost trembling hoof she reached forwards and picked up a block of meat, feeling it squish slightly against her hoof, the texture covered with a nice thin layer of grease. She raised it up to her muzzle and licked across it tentatively, a shudder running though her from the taste. Feeling her stomach grumble loudly she opened her mouth and tossed in the juicy slab, munching down on it happily before swallowing it with a loud gulp. A satisfied sigh left her as she reached for more, picking up multiple at a time and greedily putting them into her mouth, finally beginning to satiate her hunger.

Cooked meats, steamed fruits, she picked them up one after another and gulped them down almost in a fluid motion, the combination of tastes drawing her into a state of hunger deeper than she felt before and before she knew it she had finished the entire plate. A loud satisfied -uuurrp- escaped her as she rubbed a hoof over her belly happily, feeling it churn and grumble. She waved a hoof up to the dragon from before and with a nod it walked up to replace her platter with a new one.

As soon as she had finished a waiter was back to see her, this one different from the earlier one as he seemed to look fancier, stand taller. A toothy grin crossed his muzzle as he looked down at her churning stomach, it swollen to the size of looking pregnant but she was still hungry for more. She would find the dragons could be very accommodating. With a lift of a claw and a click more waiters gathered around the table, marking the dragon as the head waiter. "Clear away and bring the next course, chop chop," the head waiter called.

Instantly the platter was gone, pulled from Moonbounce's sight, and a moment later not one, but four platters were laid out, the entire table being covered in food. Lids lifted and delicious scents vied for attention, a whole roast chicken taking up one platter, while another was filled with bowls of sweetmeats. A third platter was actually a huge bowl of thick meat broth, with generous chunks of crusty bread. The fourth held all the sweets, a pile of donuts, an assortment of chocolate coated biscuits, and a big bowl of thick, blood red jelly.

Moonbounce’s eyes nearly bulged out of her sockets as her tongue lulled out and dripped with drool. She shook her head for a moment and stared at the waiters with disbelief, "This can't be part of the meal, can it?" She reached a shy hoof forwards and prodded at one of the sweetmeats, picking it up in her hoof and bringing it to her mouth.

She took a small nip out of it as she looked at the waiter and after a sudden surge of taste she couldn't hesitate and opened her mouth wide and toss it in chomping on it happily and allowing the taste to spread on her tongue as it slowly ground to paste in her mouth. She gulped the gathered mush down and tore off a leg of the large chicken, biting into it and ripping off a long swath of greasy sweet tasting meat as well as taking a large bite out of another small meat treat. Each new bite seemed to renew the flavours that danced on her tongue and even when she ate things that seemed not appropriate to go together it meshed incredibly well, causing a resurgence of hunger to shoot through her. In rapid order she reached for meats, and confections, happily munching away and grinding the foods to paste before swallowing.

Occasionally a loud belch would escape from her mouth, the ever increasing girth of her stomach pushing into the table and compressing some building up gasses out of her mouth as she felt herself lost in a feeding frenzy. It took her almost as much time as before to finish everything that she had on her plate, leaning back and prodding at her stomach as she smiled happily at the fancy waiter, "This was all you can eat, right?" she flashed him a dopey smile, her tongue lapping across her grease stained muzzle quickly followed by a crass belch that shot some spittle onto the table.

The head waiter laughed politely. "Indeed it is, mon cheri," he replied, before clapping again. Dragon claws pulled away bowls and plates, once again clearing the plates with such efficiency it was startling. With how much Moonbounce had eaten already she'd more than devoured her money's worth, but neither the staff nor Moonbounce seemed inclined to slow their pace as the next batch of dishes was brought out. A honey glazed ham, beer battered fish, a rack of ribs, a literal pile of steaks, a double layer sponge cake, a selection of chocolate dipped strawberries... all of it was heaped onto the table a second later.

"Please... tell us if you are having trouble, and we will be happy to assist," the waiter told her with a smile, before lifting out a bottle of wine and pouring it into a glass. "On the house," he added as he slipped it over. Moonbounce might recognise the enchanted vintage as a favourite in noble households as it made you literally forget your stomach capacity, eliminating the pain it would cause and letting you just keep on feasting and feasting...

Moonbounce rubbed her hooves and smacked her lips eagerly as the meal was laid out before her, she was about to reach forward when the waiter presented her with the bottle and it took a moment for her to recognise it. "Thank you, this place is great!" She emptied the wine glass with a quick swig and felt the burning liquid stream down her throat, it beginning to affect her stomach slowly. Where she had been feeling slightly stuffed a moment ago, now she simply felt her hunger return as it let out a loud gurgle.

After giving the waiter a happy bow eliciting a drawn out belch she reached for the pile of steaks, sliding them into her maw one by one, drool and grease dripping down the sides of her muzzle and staining against the table and her now protruding belly. She wiped away at it idly, smearing it over her coat as she let out a soft belch that spread the stink of acid burned beef roll out of her. She munched down without reservation, picking the large honeyed ham between her hooves and biting into it like a stick of corn, tearing off chunks greedily and letting swaths of droplets splatter around as she dug into it messily. With a loud gulp she swallowed the last bit of the ham a low belch escaping -uuorrp-.

Reaching forward she had to shimmy herself back and forth to reach over her now incredibly distended stomach, the rounding sphere way beyond what her body should be able to handle yet she rolled onto it, the compressing sack causing an annoyed set of glorps to escape before her tail fluttered with a bout of flatulence. Opening her mouth she dragged the large cake closer and stuffed large chunks of it into her mouth, digging into it with her hooves and swallowing down the incredibly sweet mass large globs at a time. Once done with the tasty treat she let out a happy belch and reached for the strawberries, swallowing them in small piles before she was finished.

Her stomach was huge, having been filled with enough food to feed a few hungry families. She looked up at the waiter lazily and smiled, her mouth positively soiled with grease and pastry mush, "Think I can have some more?" she chuckled a little tiredly.

The waiter smiled. "That depends, madam. It seems your original waiter did not take payment beforehand as we normally do here. The cover price for the meal is 200 bits, and you've more than eaten that much already," the head waiter said, before laughing at the poor joke. "As soon as the bits are in my claw we will keep on feeding you, as much as you can eat as. That was a promise," he said, his smile seeming rather dark as he stretched out a hand and made a motion for the payment.

Moonbounce looked at him and blinked for a moment, "200 bits..." she repeated to herself suddenly feeling her stomach being a lot heavier than it was a moment ago. "-uurrp- Heh, I may be a little short on 200... do you keep a tab by any chance?" She gave the waiter her most persuasive smile as her stomach grumbled beneath her.

All the while her stomach groaned loudly, the mass of mulch within her slowly slopping apart and sloshing about. "Fine, I'll help you -braap- clean-up for this shift. There were six waiter dragons holding up Moonbounce, the fat thestral not having much solid places to grab seeing as she was more than 50% belly at this point, the massive sack of a stomach sagging low, bouncing back and forth with each step the dragons took as she was carried over their shoulders like they were bearing a coffin to its grave. The head waiter led from the front, not feeling the slight squirming from the mare as his waiters kept her in their grip, even though her whole body shook and bounced much like a huge platter of jelly. "Oh no, you'll be helping to fill tables," the waiter replied vaguely, smirking as the group left the main dining hall and entered the kitchens. Dragons looked up at her as she was pulled past, many smirking as she was brought to the back of the kitchens, where a huge metal rotisserie was slowly spinning, currently empty and waiting to be filled.

Moonbounce felt unease creep on her at the waiters words and she began to feel a little helpless as her struggles did little more than to cause ripples to roll down her sloshing belly, "Well, I guess I could fill a table, but I don't see much of a point to resting on one." she groped her stomach and looked about, it being slightly larger than the tables in the restaurant. She felt a shudder run though her as she looked at the smirking dragons that surrounded her, their eyes telling her that something was off and once she saw the huge metal rotisserie she began to sweat. "Oh, you want me to roll the spit around, Well, I guess I can just about reach it like this." she laughed nervously.

The dragons all began to laugh along with Moonbounce, though it was clearly at her expense. The head waiter grabbed the spit, lifting it off and seeming not to care about the metal already being hot. The mare was turned around, her bouncy and now huge ass cheeks being spread wide to show off her thick rimmed pucker. She was too fat to even look over her shoulders, only feeling her ass cheeks spreading, knowing what the head waiter held. "Oh yes, you will roll around on the spit, then we will sell you for 200 bits, to recuperate our losses," he explained. Then without ceremony the burning hot rod of metal was rammed up her ass like a lance, the pole burrowing all the way up through her intestines and to her stomach in one hard shove, every inch of flesh it touching burning with heat... but the wine's pain numbing effect meant though she could feel her insides burn, she didn't feel the agonising pain. She knew she was cooking from the inside, felt the pole being rammed up her ass, but it didn't hurt at all.

Moonbounce whimpered in fear, "You- you can't do that, I'm a royal guard!" She tried to kick at the dragons, but was unable to reach much further than her belly as she was turned around by the dragons and her cheeks were spread by strong claws that dug into her doughy flesh. She tried to protest and gasped as she felt the searing hot rod prod at her rear, slowly sliding towards her ponut and poke into the tight ring. Though she couldn't feel the heat or the excruciating pain she should be going through she felt the split slide into her and tear at her insides, puncturing her intestines and various on its way through her. Warm amber slitted eyes grace her face, and her purple armour matches the leathery length of her wings when they are outstretched. A mane of dark blue sits atop her head and is usually messy, just like her tail. Her cutiemark is the moon appearing to be moving upwards courtesy of speed lines.
